section_hero.title: Multiplatform Messaging, Trackers Not Included.
section_hero.description: Satellite.im gives you peace of mind with end-to-end encryption without sacrificing quality.

description.one: Satellite.im is built using modern, decentralized technologies with peer 2 peer workflows. Everything is encrypted so your data only gets read by who you intend it to. We store files on a distributed network so redundancy comes built in along with large file storage.
description.two: All these things come without compromises to your experience.

multi_platform.title: Multi-Platform
multi_platform.description: Chat from anywhere, from desktop and beyond Satellite.im has you covered. Satellite.im is also built to be offline-first so whether you have a good connection or not you can be sure you get your message out there! Our mobile app installs as a PWA during Early Access so setup is quick, and you get updates immediately.

chat.title: Multi Platform chat
chat.description: Chat anywhere with our cross platform app.

sharing.title: Easy File sharing
sharing.description: Share up to 4GB files instantly with friends.

serverless.title: Decentralized and Peer-to-peer
serverless.description: Your data goes straight to your friends, nobody tracking in the middle.

description.one: Satellite.im is nearing our early access beta! If you'd like to get started ahead of the curve you can join our mailing list and get notified of releases. You can give Satellite.im a try right now but expect some bugs and please understand it is not representative of our final product.
description.two: Satellite.im installs as a PWA which makes it very easy to get started, just navigate to https://core.satellite.im on your phone to get started.

section_team.title: Our Team
section_team.description: Satellite.im is full of passionate open-source developers as well as our in house team which both work hard to build a different kind of chat platform.
